articles.title: Five key questions about Google and Apple's contact tracing system - The Telegraph
articles.description: Apple and Google's system is being held up as the solution to the UK's contact-tracing app conundrum
articles.content:
NHS tests found the Apple-Google system could not tell if another phone was one or three metres apart.
However, the NHSX project quickly ran into a host of basic technical challenges.
To work, the … [+3267 chars]

articles.title: Samsung, Huawei and Google facing big pressure from incredibly cheap new rival - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG, Huawei and Google could soon be facing some major pressure from a cheap new rival.
articles.content:
This year's OnePlus 8 was priced from £599, while the OnePlus 8 Pro cost either £799 for 8GB of RAM with 128GB of storage, or £899 for 12GB of RAM and 256GB of space.
